# Support

Welcome to BenchmarkOS! We're here to help you get the most out of our institutional-grade finance copilot.

## ğŸ“š Documentation

Before asking for help, please check our comprehensive documentation:

### Getting Started
- **[README.md](../README.md)** - Project overview and quick start
- **[INSTALLATION_GUIDE.md](../docs/INSTALLATION_GUIDE.md)** - Detailed setup instructions

### Usage Guides

## ğŸ› Found a Bug?

If you've found a bug, please:

1. **Check existing issues** - Someone may have already reported it
2. **Use our bug report template** - Click [New Issue](https://github.com/haniae/Team2-CBA-Project/issues/new/choose) and select "Bug Report"
3. **Provide details** - Include error messages, steps to reproduce, and your environment

## ğŸ’¡ Have a Feature Request?

We'd love to hear your ideas!

1. **Check existing feature requests** - Vote on existing ones if similar
2. **Use our feature request template** - Click [New Issue](https://github.com/haniae/Team2-CBA-Project/issues/new/choose) and select "Feature Request"
3. **Describe your use case** - Help us understand the problem you're solving

## ğŸ’¬ Ask Questions

### GitHub Discussions
For general questions, ideas, and community support:
- **[Start a Discussion](https://github.com/haniae/Team2-CBA-Project/discussions)**

Topics include:
- ğŸ’¡ Ideas and brainstorming
- ğŸ™ Q&A and help
- ğŸ“£ Announcements
- ğŸ—³ï¸ Polls and feedback

### Academic Support
For course-related questions (GW University students):
- **Contact:** Professor Patrick Hall
- **Course:** DNSC 6317 - Fall 2025
- **Context:** This is a practicum project

## ğŸ¤ Contributing

Want to contribute to BenchmarkOS?

1. Read our **[Contributing Guide](../CONTRIBUTING.md)**
2. Check the **[Code of Conduct](../CODE_OF_CONDUCT.md)**
3. Review open issues labeled `good first issue` or `help wanted`

## ğŸ“§ Direct Contact

### For Security Issues
- **DO NOT** create a public issue
- Follow our **[Security Policy](../SECURITY.md)**
- Report privately via GitHub Security Advisory

### For Other Inquiries
- **General questions:** Use GitHub Discussions
- **Bug reports:** Use GitHub Issues
- **Feature requests:** Use GitHub Issues
- **Academic matters:** Contact course faculty

## â±ï¸ Response Times

| Type | Expected Response |
|------|-------------------|
| Security vulnerabilities | 48 hours |
| Bug reports | 3-5 business days |
| Feature requests | 1 week |
| General questions | 1-2 weeks |
| Pull requests | 1 week for review |

*Note: As this is an academic project, response times may vary during exam periods or semester breaks.*

## ğŸŒŸ Community Guidelines

Please:
- âœ… Be respectful and professional
- âœ… Search before posting
- âœ… Provide context and details
- âœ… Follow our Code of Conduct
- âœ… Be patient - we're students too!

Please don't:
- âŒ Post spam or advertisements
- âŒ Be rude or dismissive
- âŒ Share sensitive data publicly
- âŒ Demand immediate responses

## ğŸ“ Academic Context

BenchmarkOS is a Fall 2025 practicum project at The George Washington University:
- **Course:** DNSC 6317
- **Team:** Team 2 (Hania A., Van Nhi Vuong, Malcolm Muoriyarwa, Devarsh Patel)
- **Faculty:** Professor Patrick Hall
- **Goal:** Build an explainable, auditable finance copilot for institutional use

## ğŸ™ Thank You!

Thank you for using BenchmarkOS! Your feedback helps us improve and learn. We appreciate your patience and contributions to this academic project.
